name: Into The Clouds
description:
Remember when you were a kid, hanging upside down on rails and afraid of falling into the sky?

This game tries to capture that experience.

How to Play

Press A/D or Left/Right to move along the rail.

I always thought the experience of hanging upside down jarring. So left is right and right is left. Additionally, you must collect the coins that spawn within 3 seconds. If you don't, then you fall into the clouds.

A gameover screen was implemented, but I ran out of time to make it work properly. So simply reload the game or browser window to keep playing.

Thanks.
